pageContext.claim:
“Watching @BarackObama take credit for @realDonaldTrump successes is disgraceful.

Score So Far- TRUMP: -Unemployment Rate -GDP -Wage Growth -# Blacks Employed -# Hispanics Employed -# Women Employed -ISIS Wins -Homegrown Terror Events OBAMA: -Slick Speaking -School Shootings”
pageContext.analysis: Trump regularly disparages Obama's handling of the economy, but the majority of economic trends that have continued under Trump's first term started under Obama and growth has stayed relatively stable.
